Pepsi Coke
summary_markdown: This data presents a comparative analysis of Coke and Pepsi sales in 2012, visualized as a stacked bar chart. The x-axis ranges from 0 to 20, representing units or categories, while the y-axis displays values from 0 to 80 in increments of 10. The chart structure indicates that Coke occupies the majority of the sales volume, represented by a red bar extending across almost the entire width of the chart. Pepsi's sales are depicted by a blue bar, positioned at the beginning of the x-axis and occupying a significantly smaller portion compared to Coke. This visual representation highlights Coke's dominant market share over Pepsi within the observed period.
